messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: THE NEW LAW OF THE STATION IS THE NON AGGRESSION PRINCIPLE. AS LONG AS YOU DON'T BREAK IT YOU WON'T BE PUNISHED. THIS MEANS ALL DRUGS ARE LEGAL.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Alright boys, we got syndies. If you see any suspicious activity report it. All syndicates are syndicaalist scum and must be purged. PHYSICALLY REMOVE ALL LEFTISTS!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a horde of squeaking things have stampeded into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: CLIMATE CHANGE IS PROPAGATED BY THE CHINESE-ZIONIST LOBBY!! IT'S FAKE NEWS!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, not more than 15 squeaking things have migrated into the maintenance tunnels.
